titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: The Receiver & the Precentor came to me this evening with the lamentable tidings that the Queen was gravely ill, the Royal Family being summoned to Osborne in hot haste. I ordered prayers to be asked for her Majesty tomorrow.
